word: Immortal glory and eternal life is the reward that our Redeemer offers to those who will be obedient to Him. He has made it possible for them to perfect Christian character through His name and to overcome on their own account as He overcame in their behalf. He has given them an example in His own life, showing them how they may overcome. \93The wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.\94\97Testimonies for the Church, vol. 3, pp. 363-365.
